bibl.title: Shenoute in Scetis: New Archaeological Evidence for the Cult of a Monastic Saint in Early Medieval Wādī al-Naṭrūn.
bibl.note: The Archaeology of a Monastic Residence in Wādī al-Naṭrūn. - Dipinto 8: New Evidence for Devotion to Saint Shenoute in Scetis [in Coptic, mid-tenth century; transcription and translation by Chrysi Kotsifou]. - The Cult of St. Shenoute in Medieval Scetis: Liturgical Commemoration; - Papal Patronage and the Dedication of a Church to St. Shenoute; - Hagiography and Scribal Practice. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Stephen J. Davis, Shenoute in Scetis: New Archaeological Evidence for the Cult of a Monastic Saint in Early Medieval Wādī al-Naṭrūn.

The Archaeology of a Monastic Residence in Wādī al-Naṭrūn. - Dipinto 8: New Evidence for Devotion to Saint Shenoute in Scetis [in Coptic, mid-tenth century; transcription and translation by Chrysi Kotsifou]. - The Cult of St. Shenoute in Medieval Scetis: Liturgical Commemoration; - Papal Patronage and the Dedication of a Church to St. Shenoute; - Hagiography and Scribal Practice. - Conclusion.
